whoever.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc
whoever.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I’ll take whoever wants to go.
When you’re done with the book, just give it to Kristin or Shelley or whoever.
whoever.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to talk about a specific person or people, although you do not know who they are
whoever.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Whoever is responsible for this will be punished.
whoever.translation[0].definitions[2].de: used to mean ‘who’ at the beginning of a question to show surprise or anger
whoever.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Whoever would do a thing like that to an old woman?
